thread.title: Giants WR Beckham active for Monday night's game against Eagles after hamstring injury
thread.title_full: Giants WR Beckham active for Monday night's game against Eagles after hamstring injury

title: Giants WR Beckham active for Monday night's game against Eagles after hamstring injury
text:
Giants WR Beckham active for Monday night's game against Eagles after hamstring injury THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   7:56   7:56   
People: 
Pennsylvania (896) 
PHILADELPHIA — New York Giants receiver Odell Beckham Jr., will play Monday night against the Philadelphia Eagles after suffering a hamstring injury last week. 
Beckham leads the Giants with 31 receptions for 428 yards and three touchdowns. He was hurt against the San Francisco 49ers and missed both of New York's full practices Thursday and Friday. 
Eagles running back Ryan Mathews also is active. Mathews, who leads the Eagles with 205 yards rushing, had been listed as questionable with a groin injury. 
Eagles linebackers Kiko Alonso (knee) and Mychal Kendricks (hamstring), and wide receiver Nelson Agholor (leg) are all inactive. 
Wide receiver Victor Cruz (calf), cornerback Prince Amukamara (pectoral) and linebacker Devon Kennard (hamstring) are among New York's inactives. 
AP NFL website: http://www.pro32.ap.org and http://www.twitter.com/AP_NFL
